oneOf.description: `account` - Grants access to the /v2/account endpoint (This permission is required for all API keys).
Grants access to view each character's equipped specializations and gear.
Grants access to guild info under the /v2/guild/:id/ sub-endpoints.
Grants access to inventories in the /v2/characters, /v2/account/bank, and /v2/account/materials endpoints.
Grants access to achievements, dungeon unlock status, mastery point assignments, and general PvE progress.
Grants access to the /v2/account/skins and /v2/account/dyes endpoints.
